name: Ucromia
description:
You can play Ucromia now, the new platform arcade shooter by Daconde Studios.

Ucromia is an unprotected and corrupt city, where the only hope is to survive for another day.

Help Adam Bennett obtaining the desired cards to pass the next level.

Jump, shot and slice your enemies´ bullets. Do whatever you need...but escape from Ucromia now!

- Platform arcade shooter gameplay
- Original pixelart graphics
- Awesome music track by Anamanaguchi

Made for #cyberpunkjam.

Build v0.40
